ygData.subject: Languages on The Rathe!
ygData.msgSnippet: Calling all people from all over! Ding Ding!*Rings Bell* Ding Ding! I would like anyone to come and teach others, and them in turn teach others, and for all of
ygData.messageBody:
Calling all people from all over! Ding Ding!*Rings Bell* Ding Ding!
I would like anyone to come and teach others, and them in turn teach
others, and for all of us to learn new and wonderful languages of ANY
kind on The Rathe server!
I am a lvl 6 almost lvl 7 High Elf Wizard in Greater Faydark! Plz e-mail
me with your name, current lvl, race, and any languages you know and
what your skill is in them(i. e. Excellent, Below Average, etc...)! I am
going to try to organize a small little language meeting for anyone that
would like to come! I will not accept any people that want to be given
money for this meeting, this is expressly for wizards to share
knowledge, not sell it!
Again, On THE RATHE server!
-Malvos, Lvl 6 of The Rathe currently residing in Greater Faydark
